items.title:
RT by @Brezel1900: 🚀 Arkreen Q3 2024 Highlights! 🌿

🌍 Milestones:
1️⃣150K miners & 150K blocks greened 🎉
2️⃣ATH 100GWh ART consumed for on-chain offsets! 🔥

🌐 Global Meetups in NYC🇺🇸, Lisbon🇵🇹, Brussels🇧🇪, Anaheim 🇺🇸, HK🇭🇰, Singapore 🇸🇬

🔋 Programs:
1️⃣Arkreen CSP 🌞
2️⃣PGP Plug for Green 🔌
3️⃣Simple Staking 💰
4️⃣GreenBTC Transition to V2 🌳

🤝 Partnerships, AMA, & Top Blogs

Join the Arkreen journey towards a carbon-neutral earth! 🌎
